scriptMenuStripDynamic.contentsScriptCode: import construct actions = construct.actions.collect() identifiers = sorted([k for k in actions.keys() if not k.startswith('launch')]) labels = [actions[key].label for key in identifiers] return [item for items in zip(identifiers, labels) for item in items]
scriptMenuStripDynamic.scriptCode: import construct from construct_ui import resources identifier = kwargs["selectedtoken"] label = kwargs["selectedlabel"] action = construct.actions.get(identifier) host = construct.get_host() parent = host.get_qt_parent() form_cls = construct.get_form(action.identifier) if form_cls: import Qt factory = Qt.QtWidgets.QStyleFactory style = factory.create(factory.keys()[0]) form = form_cls(action, construct.get_context(), parent) form.setPalette(form.style().standardPalette()) form.setStyle(style) form.setStyleSheet(resources.style(':/styles/dark')) form.show() else: action().run()
